name: Leadessay Writing Services Ltd
tag_list: custom-essay, term-paper, dissertation, assignments, academic-papers, essay
overview:
Leadessay.com is a custom writing agency that handles academic and professional writing/research projects over the Internet. They have a large team of certified writers who work in-house and remotely to deliver even the difficult assignments.They have a reputation of writing non-plagiarized academic papers.

Academic projects that have been successfully handled by leadessay.com includes:Term papers,Research papers in all citation styles, Book reports and reviews, Artwork reviews, Thesis papers,dissertations, Annotated bibliographies among others.

All projects are done from scratch based on the clients specifications. The professional writers conduct the research and write the paper in Microsoft Word.Then editors proofread every single paper and run it through plagiarism detection software to guarantee 100% authenticity.

The price is affordable for the majority of students than that of the competition. Our writers constitute our most valuable resource and, thus, we never employ foreign individuals who are not proficient in the English language. Many of our competitors advertise low rates concealing the true qualifications of their employees. Even though we cannot beat them on price, we still beat them in the long run as a legitimate business that thrives on return clientele.

Orders are strictly send to the clients on the requested date and time. Leadessay.com writers are aware of this and therefore no excuse is tolerated. If the project is too complex (less than 1% of all orders received) for the writers, it is acknowledged immediately and notification promptly send to the affected client for special arrangements.

Using this service is absolutely safe because they take the relationship with the clients very seriously and never disclose any information regarding the transactions and dealings to any third parties. None of the information that is received from clients is ever disclosed to anyone. The projects that are completed for the clients are never resold.
